column4: I suspect that it's just a bad burn, Stephen; I can't tell you how many coasters I created burning ISOs..
if it's not installed then you can do so.
well K3b is the program that allows for you to burn ISO files, alternately, you can right click on the ISO file, and it says open with cd burner, or some such.
then it will burn the ISO for you automatically.
Just have to be patient, you can and will get it done.
is there an easy way to put someone's name at the beginningof the message, other than typing it?
that tab thing works on your command line too
thanks--that is what I said as well :}
